title: Under a Full Moon
description: In this Dateline classic, a Las Vegas cocktail waitress is found murdered in her home, leading authorities to wonder if there is a predator at large. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on November 6, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
